title: Kamisama ni Misuterareta Hatsukakan: Kankin Jiken no Yukue
original_name: 神様に見捨てられた 20 日間 監禁事件の行方
sinopse:
It was the night of Christmas Eve, when Haruka and Kyouichi were supposed to have spent their first night together. However, by coincidence, they became the witnesses to a convenience store robbery, and their future made a drastic change...

Confinement.

Will there be a brighter future for the two, who became involved in this tragedy?

(Source: Midnight Scans)
